title: Setup Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for VitaTrack Frontend
instruction: Configure Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui component library for VitaTrack frontend styling. Setup custom design system with VitaTrack branding, color palette, typography, and spacing scales. Implement responsive design utilities, dark/light theme support, and accessibility features. Create custom component variants, animation utilities, and design tokens. Setup component documentation and style guide for consistent UI development across the application.
